what: Combine multiple data frames by row with metadata from names — bind_rows_meta
title: Combine multiple data frames by row with metadata from names — bind_rows_meta
text: wrapper around dplyr::bind_rows() allows combine multiple data frames metadata. metadata extracted names data frames. names data frames form prefix_meta1_meta2_... given delimiter set _. metadata columns extracted converted appropriate types.

title: Combine multiple data frames by row with metadata from names — bind_rows_meta
Combine multiple data frames by row with metadata from names — bind_rows_meta
text: ... Data frames combine. Typically, named appropriately extract metadata. .names_meta, .patterns_meta Character vectors names patterns extract metadata names data frames. .names_meta used name metadata columns .patterns_meta used extract values. .names_meta NULL, metadata parsing skipped. .patterns_meta NULL, assumed ".*". .delim Delimiter used names data frames separate different pieces metadata. .prefix Prefix removed target names retrieve metadata.

title: Combine multiple data frames by row with metadata from names — bind_rows_meta

what: Create a call to a function with its arguments — call_full
title: Create a call to a function with its arguments — call_full
text: basically wrapper around rlang::call2() allows extract arguments function pass rlang::call2() without type .
